I have two DataGrid binding tricks I want to know how to do:

1. I'd like to have a column's binding ItemsSource be different than the others. In my situation, I need to have a column bound to the selected item of a combobox and the path a property of the selected object.

2. I'd like to have a more than one binding for a column. I'd like a binding one-way target to source and another one-way source to target. So the effect here would be a passthrough of data from one data source object to another, through the datagrid's column's binding.

 

TIA,
